title: Smoked salmon and chive choux buns with watermelon and feta bites
description: These delicious mouthfuls are pure festive indulgence - serve them as canapés at your Christmas party.
ingredients: 2 tbsp very finely chopped fresh chives
½ small watermelon, flesh cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
small handful fresh basil leaves, preferably Greek basil
